snippet.title: Yelp is selling Eat24 to Grubhub for $287.5 million
snippet.content:
Yelp is selling its Eat24 food delivery service to Grubhub for $US287.5 million in cash, the company announced today.
Yelp shares are up 18% in after hours trading on the news.
This story is developing...
